text: Ål Bygdamuseum, a small museum on the farm Leksvol in Ål municipality in Viken county, Norway, is a subsidiary of Hallingdal Museum. It includes 30 old buildings, including the house from Leksvol farm which dates from about 1600, a mountain farm (støl) with a stone building, and a cotter's farm place. ==References== ==External links== * Official site, -- in Norwegian Category:Ål Category:Museums in Viken Category:Open-air museums in Norway
title: Ål Bygdamuseum
